name: Shoot Down the Missiles
description:
This is an assignment created in one week using assets found online.

Controls-

  • Arrow keys select menu options and move your ship in game.
  • Space chooses a menu option and shoots current weapon.
  • Z, X, C, A, S select a weapon type (there are so many as it was extra credit lol).

Shoot down enemies trying to destroy your mothership! Be careful though: as you survive longer, enemies become more numerous, have more health, and new varieties come into play (4 different types)! The weapon tied to C uses special ammo that can be restored by certain enemy drops, use it wisely and good luck!
